text: Sure, a little black dress or Le Smoking suit is always on par for the party scene, but who says holiday dressing has to be so cut and dry? From velvet jackets to bold-shouldered party dresses, here are 20 not-so-basic ideas for giving festive a whole new name this holiday season.
title: 20 Best Christmas Party Outfits 2018

og.description: 20 Slides of Pure Holiday Style Inspiration
